data.meta_description: Catch up with your favorite TLC shows anytime, anywhere with the all-new TLC GO app - and now get access to up to 14 additional networks including Food Network,â¦
data.text:
Catch up with your favorite TLC shows and more from up to 14 networks, including ID, Food Network and Travel Channel! All in one app, free with your pay TV subscription.

Catch up with your favorite TLC shows anytime, anywhere with the all-new TLC GO app - and now get access to up to 14 additional networks including Food Network, ID, Travel Channel, Discovery and more - all in one app. Itâs FREE with your pay TV subscription.

Link your pay TV provider (cable, satellite, telco, live TV streaming service) to access TLC favorites like Sister Wives, My 600-lb Life, Dr. Pimple Popper, OutDaughtered, Seeking Sister Wife, Doubling Down with the Derricos, 1000-lb Sisters and many more - plus top shows from other networks including Home Town (HGTV), Worst Cooks in America (Food Network), Ghost Adventures (Travel Channel), Evil Lives Here (ID), Naked and Afraid (Discovery) and more. New episodes are available the same day as they premiere on TV.

With TLC GO You Can:

â¢ Stream TLC and more networks LIVE anytime, anywhere on all your favorite devices

â¢ Find shows to watch with the live schedule guide

â¢ Access thousands of episodes on demand - from current hits to classic favorites

â¢ See new episodes of shows on the app the same day and time they premiere on TV

â¢ Binge your favorite TLC series and specials including Sister Wives, My 600-lb Life, Dr. Pimple Popper, OutDaughtered, Seeking Sister Wife, Doubling Down with the Derricos, 1000-lb Sisters - and many more!

â¢ Get unlimited access to everything the Discovery family of networks has to offer - free with your pay TV subscription

Features:

â¢ Stream live TV when you log in with your pay TV provider

â¢ Watch select episodes and entire seasons of your favorite shows from up to 15 networks!

â¢ Browse by genre - from Natural History, Science and Tech to Food, Home and more - to find your favorite shows and discover new ones

â¢ Continue watching episodes where you left off across all of your devices

â¢ Save shows and episodes to watch later with My List

â¢ Compatible with tvOS and Chromecast

â¢ Closed-captioning support

Requirements:

â¢ Available in the U.S. only

â¢ Wi-Fi connection recommended

â¢ iOS 12 or higher

Need help? Visit gohelp.discovery.com.

Visitor Agreement: https://corporate.discovery.com/visitor-agreement/

Privacy Notice: https://corporate.discovery.com/privacy-policy

California Privacy Notice: https://corporate.discovery.com/privacy-policy/#cappi

California Do Not Sell My Personal Info: https://corporate.discovery.com/california_dns

We may work with third-party advertising companies and other partners that help us deliver tailored advertisements to you. To opt out of behavioral tracking on mobile devices, you may use the DAA AppChoices Tool, available at http://www.aboutads.info/appchoices.

ZeusAppollo ,

Whatâs up people

After reading the reviews for this app...I really donât understand others. I love this app! I get to catch up on episodes of shows that I missed over the past several months or even a year. See, you do not subscribe to cable, dish, or have an antenna. We watch a lot of Redbox movies.

But, when I visit my family in PA, I can watch all of those stupid shows that are really useless television. No lessons learned, family values (already raised my children), or vulgar language. So, I really only have two shows that I watch on TLCgo. They are: My Big Fat Fabulous Life, because I can relate to Whitney with being a large person at one time of my life. Plus, if I could get ahold of Todd, I would be telling him, âThe world does not revolve around you and grow up!â The other show I like to watch is, â90 Day FiancÃ© â. Because people are ssooooo darn stupid to think that person you brought not our country is here for your love.....think again!! It is a rarity that the marriages really do work out.

As for the commercials, at least the app lets you know how many commercials you will be having. Regular TV does not do that, and then you never know when to leave the room. Is their going to be another commercial or not, do I have time for a drink, etc. Plus, it is a free app....just be grateful for that! ð¥

Developer Response ,

Hey Zeus! Glad you love the app and get to have some moments of guilt-free watching! We'd love to know what we can do to push your review from 4 stars to 5 stars! Let us know at the link below. http://tlc.custhelp.com/

CLBBR ,

TLC

I enjoy this app, just way too many commercials. If/when I rewind I do not like that I have to re-watch the same 8 commercials, they should be skipped over and go straight into the show if they have already been played. It would be nice to have a 10 second rewind option so that doesnât happen, or if Iâm interrupted or have to stop watching and come back later and I rewind part of an episode, it would be nice to not have to watch the same commercials again to find your place in the show if you have to go backwards a segment or 2. Itâs annoying and a big time waster. I understand the need for commercials, but there are a lot, and repeating in the same place commercials have already been played can be frustrating.

Developer Response ,

Right now, due to the current functionality, moving around a video will cause the ads to play again even if you've already watched those breaks. Love your feature request however, itâs a great idea and appreciate you sharing it with us. If you have any additional suggestions to improve your experience please let us know. It's possible that requests such as yours will be added in the future, so stay tuned for updates.

Molson125 ,

Disappointed

Honestly, I expected a lot more from this app. The idea is great and I really do love the fact that I can catch up on episodes of shows I missed. But the app is too flawed for me to be able to use it effectively. It requires me to resign in to my tv provider every time I open the app which is frustrating. Even after signing in sometimes it wonât let me watch episodes Iâm usually able to watch because theyâre âlockedâ. When I click on them to see why theyâre locked, it says itâs because Iâm not signed in even when I am!! Then once Iâm finally able to watch episodes, they will often skip. Meaning, Iâll start watching the beginning of an episode and out of nowhere itâs skips to the end! This is so frustrating because when I try to rewind it back to the beginning, the app glitches and then will shut down. These are only a few of the problems Iâve encountered, trust me there are a lot more. I truly love TLC, and wish they would put more time into working out these bugs so I can properly enjoy the app and episodes I miss.

Developer Response ,

Thank you for the detailed feedback, we're very sorry that you've been experiencing these issues with the app. Have you tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app recently? We'd like to address these issues and get the app working properly. Would you mind contacting us through our "Ask a Question" page via the link below? Our team will be able to troubleshoot these issues you're having and give you information on how to fix them.

https://tlc.custhelp.com/app/ask
